content.quickAnswer: Essential Costa Blanca Phone Nummern: Emergency 112, Polizei 091/092, Medical 061 Und Guardia Civil 062. Keep Diese Contacts Accessible Along Mit Local Krankenhäuser, Utility Companies Und Town Halls Für Comprehensive Safety Und Practical Support.
content.intro: Moving Zu Costa Blanca Requires Familiarity Mit Emergency Contacts Und Practical Services—Diesen Reference Guide Consolidates Critical Phone Nummern, Government Offices Und Utility Contacts In One Place. Whether Handling Medical Emergencies, Reporting Crimes Oder Managing Household Utilities, Quick Zugang Zu Correct Contact Information Simplifies Crisis Response Und Administrative Processes. Save Diese Nummern In Deinem Phone Und Keep Printed Copy Bei Home.

sections.title: Emergency Nummern
sections.content:
Die Single Emergency Nummern Throughout Spanien Ist **112** (Polizei, Ambulance, Fire)—Operators Sind Multilingual Und Respond Zu English Requests. Call 112 Für Life-Threatening Situations, Serious Injuries, Fires, Accidents Oder Crimes In Progress. Spezifische Service Lines Exist Für Non-Emergencies:

- **National Polizei (091)** Handle Serious Crimes, Property Theft Und Serious Offenses
- **Local Polizei (092)** Address Traffic Violations, Noise Complaints Und Local Ordinances
- **Guardia Civil (062)** Manage Rural Areas Und National Security Matters
- **Coast Guard (900 202 202)** Responds Zu Maritime Emergencies, Drowning Oder Boat Distress Signals
- **Fire Department (080)** Handles Fires, Chemical Spills Und Rescue Operations

Emergency Nummern From Mobile Phones Work Even Without Active Service Plans; Keep Dein Phone Powered Und Accessible. Translation Apps Facilitate Communication During Emergencies When Language Barriers Exist. Learning Key Emergency Phrases In Spanisch Improves Response Efficiency.

sections.title: Gesundheitswesen
sections.content:
Spanien's Gesundheitswesen-System Ist Excellent; Bewohner Access Care Through Public Gesundheitswesen Service (Sistema Nacional de Salud) Oder Private Versicherung.

**Lokale Kontakte:**
- Javea Health Center: 965 791 700
- Denia Hospital: 966 426 600
- Altea Health Center: 965 843 717
- Benidorm Hospital: 965 861 800
- Calpe Health Center: 965 836 200

**Non-Emergency Medical Line (061)** Dispatches Ambulances Für Serious But Non-Critical Conditions. Emergency Room (Urgencias) Bei Major Krankenhäuser Operate 24/7; Expect Waiting Times Von 30 Minuten Zu 2 Hours Depending On Severity.

**Pharmacy Lists Und Emergency Services Rotate;** Check Pharmacy Windows Für On-Call Schedules (Farmacias de Turno). Private Kliniken Offer Faster Appointment Zugang Compared Zu Public System (€100-150 Per Visit).

sections.title: Government Services
sections.content:
Town Halls (Ayuntamientos) Manage Local Administration, Building Permits, Business Registration Und Administrative Documentation. Hours Typically 9am-2pm Monday-Friday Mit Afternoon Hours 4pm-7pm (Varies Seasonally).

**Major Town Hall Contacts:**
- Javea Ayuntamiento: 965 791 700
- Denia Ayuntamiento: 966 427 200
- Altea Ayuntamiento: 965 843 717
- Benidorm Ayuntamiento: 965 862 000
- Calpe Ayuntamiento: 965 836 900

**Non-Spanish Residents Require Residency Permits (NIE - Número de Identidad de Extranjero)** Obtained Through National Polizei Offices (Policía Nacional):
- Alicante National Polizei Office: 965 146 901
- Denia Polizei: 966 426 300

**Tax Authority (Hacienda/Agencia Tributaria)** Handles Income Tax Filing—Regional Offices Exist In All Major Towns. Property Registry (Registro de la Propiedad) Records Real Estate Transactions.

sections.title: Utilities
sections.content:
**Water (Agua):** Hidraqua Ist Primary Water Provider Across Costa Blanca Norden; Customer Service: 965 155 155. Water Emergencies (Leaks, Pressure Loss): 024 Available 24/7.

**Electricity (Electricidad):** Iberdrola Dominates Costa Blanca Service Gebiet; Customer Service: 902 567 567. Emergency Lines: 024 Für Power Outages.

**Gas (Gas Natural):** Naturgas Und Endesa Gas Serve Region; Customer Service Varies By Provider.

**Telecommunications:** Movistar (National Telephone), Vodafone, Orange Und Masmóvil Provide Mobile Und Internet Service. Shop Around Für Competitive Mobile Plans (€20-40 Monthly Für Unlimited Data) Und Broadband Packages (€35-60 Monthly Für Fiber Oder ADSL).

**Internet Service Providers (ISPs)** Include Movistar Fibra, Vodafone, Orange Und Independent Providers. Fiber Optic (Fibra Óptica) Ist Increasingly Available; Speeds Von 300 Mbps Sind Common Bei €40-50 Monthly.

**Garbage Collection (Recogida de Basuras)** Ist Municipal Responsibility; Most Towns Operate 2-3 Weekly Collection Schedules. Recycling Centers Accept Glass, Plastics Und Paper Separately; Viele Towns Have Designated Container Areas Throughout Neighborhoods.

sections.title: Local Services
sections.content:
**Consulates:**
- British Consulate Alicante: 965 216 022
- German Consulate Alicante: 965 141 455

These Offices Assist Citizens Mit Passport Renewal, Visa Issues Und Emergency Repatriation.

**Professional Services:** Real Estate Agents (Inmobiliarias) Und Legal Specialists (Abogados) Spezialisierend In Property Law Sind Available Throughout Coastal Towns. Translation Services: Multiple Professional Translators Handle Official Documents, Legal Papers Und Business Communications; Cost €50-100 Per Page Für Certified Translations.

**Banking:** Major Spanische Banks (BBVA, Santander, CaixaBank, Sabadell) Operate Throughout Costa Blanca. International Banks Offer Accounts Für Non-Residents; Require NIE Und Proof Of Residency.

**Vehicle Services:** MOT (Inspección Técnica de Vehículos, ITV) Stations Schedule Annual Vehicle Inspections; Appointment Booking Required. Mechanics Und Auto Repair Shops (Talleres) Service Most Vehicle Makes; Expect €40-80 Hourly Labor Rates (Significantly Cheaper Than Northern Europe).

**Veterinary Services:** Multiple Veterinary Clinics Serve Pet Owners; Emergency Vet Services Operate After-Hours. **Waste Disposal Services:** Junk Removal Companies (Empresas de Limpieza) Handle Large Item Disposal; Cost €50-150 Depending On Volume. **Moving Services:** Professional Moving Companies (Mudanzas) Coordinate Furniture Transport Und International Relocations; Obtain Multiple Quotes Before Committing.
